definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: almond (-tree) (NH id.; so called from its early waking out of winter’s sleep, acc. to Ki Thes Lag:BN 45 al.; Aram. [[שִׁיגְדָּא]], 4epro0, 4eprto0, whence Eth. sagd: cf. Nö:M 39; cf. Löw:No. 319);—
almond, i.e. the nut, pl. [[שְׁקֵדִים]] Ge 43:11 (J; +[[בָּטְנִים]], etc.), Nu 17:23 (P).
